entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 30 December 2022
